alert.note: Alert for Cambria; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 02 at 1:01PM EST until March 03 at 10:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Cambria and Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A coating of ice on trees and powerlines may increase the risk of power outages, particularly at higher elevations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
